ERROR TIPS

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Even after research is completed, recipes need to be enabled before crafting
- Common failing recipes: burner inserter, iron gear wheel, stone furnace, iron chest
- Check if recipe is enabled before attempting to craft

### Entity Placement Issues
- Verify you have the required item in inventory before placement (iron chest, wooden chest, stone furnace)
- Check for space conflicts when placing transport belts near existing structures
- When placing entities next to others, ensure proper spacing and direction

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in all fuel-consuming entities (boiler, drills, inserters)
- Keep track of stone reserves when planning to craft furnaces
- Maintain sufficient coal supply for power generation

### Entity Extraction Issues
- Verify correct position when attempting to extract items
- When extracting from furnaces or drills, ensure the entity exists at target position
- Check if the target entity actually contains the item you're trying to extract

### API Usage Issues
- Some entities may not have expected attributes (e.g., 'burner' attribute missing from furnace)
- Use correct entity references when checking status or contents
- Handle nil values appropriately in recipe and crafting operations

### Automation Setup Issues
- Plan chest and inserter placement carefully to avoid blocking issues
- Consider space requirements when setting up automation chains
- Ensure proper connection between automated components

### System Design Issues
- Address "waiting for space in destination" warnings with proper output handling
- Consider alternative layouts when current design causes space conflicts
- Plan for proper item flow in automated systems
